r.d: extension used for detecting XSS codes(tainted string)
r.n: - Support trim/rtrim/ltrim - Dosen't depend on exposing of zif_* symbols any more - Fixed a potential crash(PHP 5.2) - Fixed bug that concat_assign lost tainted info in php 5.4(if the var_ptr is tainted while value is not) - Fix memory leak in assign_concat - Fix tests faild of sprintf/trim etc args signature - Fixed compiler warnings
